aspectran.description: | |{{bold}}Commands that can run examples:{{bold:off}} | {{CYAN}}hello{{reset}} Prints "Hello, World!" in your console | {{CYAN}}hello2{{reset}} Prints "Hello, World!" in your console using ANSI color codes | {{CYAN}}echo1{{reset}} It accepts parameters and print as is | --- for more examples, type '{{GREEN}}translet -l{{reset}}' --- | |Use the command '{{GREEN}}undertow{{reset}}' to control the built-in Undertow Server. |Use the command '{{GREEN}}jetty{{reset}}' to control the built-in Jetty Server. | |Now that the built-in Undertow Server is running, point your web browser to: | {{81}}http://localhost:8080/{{reset}} |Now that the built-in Jetty Server is running, point your web browser to: | {{81}}http://localhost:8081/{{reset}} |
